sub_title: Senior NLP data scientist at Fanvoice | Researcher member of COPAB and LVA | Ntealan R&D member and linguist
summary:
I have more than five years' experience in NLP data science. 

I am currently looking for new challenges.

Prior to working at Fanvoice Startup as a NLP Data Scientist, my primary goal was to reduce tedious and error-prone tasks. To do this, I used mathematics, statistics, predictive modeling and machine learning techniques to develop and produce predictive models for decision-making or process optimization.

I am deeply fascinated by the creation of beloved, reliable products that help people achieve more in their work.

If you catch me out of the office, I love reading and I want to write my own books!


Competencies: SQL, NoSQL, Business Intelligence, machine learning, deep learning, Python, Numpy, Pandas, scikit-learn, Tensorflow, Keras, Pytorch, Tableau, GCP, AWS, Microsoft Azure, Airflow, Git, Dataiku.
